title: Battle43
description: A Battlefield-style shooter made in Fortnite UEFN.
modalContent:
Battle43 is like a remaster of Battlefield 1943 inside Fortnite, complete with vehicles, classes, and Conquest mode. I created 90% of the models myself, and the rest of the game was all me as well. There are a lot of custom systems, like completely custom UI, capture points, round system, destruction, first person mode & more. Battle43 has received great reviews from Battlefield content creators!

Released March 2024.

title: Just Drive
description: Arcade-inspired street racing game with cop chases.
modalContent:
The first of its kind open-world driving game in Fortnite. Large open world to freely drive around. Complete deliveries to earn coins. Spend coins on a new car, special items and car upgrades!

It was very popular for two years with constant updates and engagement from fans. It was featured by Epic Games.

Created in Fortnite Creative, so I had to abandon the project when UEFN came out. I am working on new versions of it.

Released May 2021.

title: Other Projects
modalContent: Over the years I have released over 50 projects in Fortnite. Many of which are outdated now, but each had a lot of love and effort put into them.

title: Minecraft Datapacks
description: Over 350k downloads on custom Minecraft datapacks.
modalContent:
My projects in Minecraft have over 350k downloads all together, with one datapack having 180k by itself! I love making datapacks since their limitations force me to come up with creative solutions, and because they allow me to enchance the gameplay of Minecraft.
